query: 如图,AB、AC切⊙O于B、C,DE切⊙O于F,DE交AB于点D,交AC于点E,连接DO,EO,若∠A=40°,则∠DOE的度数为()选项：['80°', '75°', '70°', '60°']
answer: 解:如图,连接OA、OB、OC；∵AB、DE分别是⊙O的切线,∴OB⊥AB,OF⊥DE；在RT△ODB与RT△ODF中,\begin{cases}OB=OF\\OD=OD\end{cases},∴△ODB≌△ODF(HL),∴∠DOB=∠DOF；同理可证:∠FOE=∠COE,∴∠DOE=\frac{1}{2}∠BOC；∵∠A+∠BOC=360°-90°-90°=180°,∴∠BOC=180°-40°=140°,∴∠DOE=70°．故选:C．
